text: læa meux luk khlun sad ma thwm mid taw phwk khea khlay fa thi khrxbkhlum phwk khea k wingwxn khx tx xallxhˌ dwy khwam brisuththicı tx phraxngkh khran meux phraxngkh di chwy hı phwk khea di khun bk nı hmu phwk khea mi phu xyu nı say klang læa mimi phu ptiseth sayyan tang «khxng rea nxkcak thuk phu thrys phu nerkhun
